articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: McCabe says his and Comey's selections for 'rigorous' IRS audits should be investigated
articles.description: Former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe on Wednesday said an investigation should be launched into how he and former FBI Director James Comey were both selected by the Internal Revenue Service for an intensive tax audit.

articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: Italian Alps glacier collapse death toll rises to 9, with 3 still missing
articles.description: Italian rescue teams on Wednesday found the bodies of two more victims of the glacier collapse in the Alps that is feared to have killed up to 12 people and is being blamed on rising temperatures.

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Where state abortion bans stand amid legal challenges
articles.description: In more than a dozen states, legal fights are underway over abortion bans and other laws that greatly limit the procedure after the US Supreme Court ended a constitutional right to an abortion on June 24.

articles.author: Shimon Prokupecz and Matthew J. Friedman, CNN
articles.title: Uvalde teacher feels forgotten by the officers sent to rescue him and his students
articles.description: Robb Elementary teacher Arnie Reyes tells CNN he could hear law enforcement outside his classroom during the mass shooting but no one came in to help.
articles.content:
Uvalde, Texas (CNN)As he lay in his own blood, with dead and dying students around him, Arnie Reyes knew help was just outside the classroom door.
